title: Thoughts on Learning Human and Programming Languages
authors: Daniel S. Katz and Jeffrey C. Carver
abstract:
This is a virtual dialog between Jeffrey C. Carver and Daniel S. Katz on how
people learn programming languages. It's based on a talk Jeff gave at the first
US-RSE Conference (US-RSE'23), which led Dan to think about human languages
versus computer languages. Dan discussed this with Jeff at the conference, and
this discussion continued asynchronous, with this column being a record of the
discussion.
